scene_description_enriched: A central figure, depicted as an elderly man with a long white beard and hair, wearing a blue robe adorned with crosses and a red mantle, is surrounded by a radiant golden halo. He raises his right hand in a gesture of blessing and holds a globe surmounted by a cross in his left arm. Around him, several angels with blue and red wings and bodies are depicted in prayerful poses, some with their hands clasped. The background is a gradient of green and yellow, suggesting a divine or celestial setting.
